mean_cn: v. 使无效，使不能运转，使无能，使伤残，使丧失活动能力
mean_en: to injure or affect somebody permanently so that, for example, they cannot walk or cannot use a part of their body; to make something unable to work so that it cannot be used
sentence: The thief disabled the security camera.
sentence_trans: 小偷破坏了监控摄像头。
word_etyma: dis不 + able形容词后缀，具有某种性质的 → disable使丧失能力，伤残
